title: Double trouble
creator_credit: Lee Robinson, Geoffrey Bell and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Designed to establish cordial relations between Australians and migrants from Europe. Two Australian who criticise the newcomers’ lack of English find themselves in serious difficulties when magically transported to a foreign country.
creator_credit_for_label: Lee Robinson, Geoffrey Bell and Australian National Film Board
description: Designed to establish cordial relations between Australians and migrants from Europe. Two Australian who criticise the newcomers’ lack of English find themselves in serious difficulties when magically transported to a foreign country.
